Send Do-Not-Track header,

filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `NoCoin Filter List (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hoshsadiq/adblock-nocoin-list/master/nocoin.txt)`, `User DNS filter (url: none)`, `Malicious URL Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/urlhaus-filter-agh.txt)`, `Phishing URL Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/phishing-filter-agh.txt)`, `Botnet IP Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/botnet-filter-agh.txt)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

User filter (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)
AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://bafista.ru/kakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbafista.ru%2Fkakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=NoCoin%2520Filter%2520List%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fhoshsadiq%2Fadblock-nocoin-list%2Fmaster%2Fnocoin.txt%29%2CUser%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=NoCoin%2520Filter%2520List%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fhoshsadiq%2Fadblock-nocoin-list%2Fmaster%2Fnocoin.txt%29%2CUser%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CMalicious%2520URL%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Furlhaus-filter-agh.txt%29%2CPhishing%2520URL%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Fphishing-filter-agh.txt%29%2CBotnet%2520IP%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Fbotnet-filter-agh.txt%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=208.14.1.2.3.4.255.256.257&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbafista.ru%2Fkakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_t comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Showing `ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL` error on many websites.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

I'm using DNS. So, don't know the version. 

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://bollyflix.pet, etc

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Popups filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. It is showing `ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL` error on many websites, like movies sites, some online tech blogging sites, etc. Disabling or switching to Auto automatically fixes the issue. This issue started occuring from last 1-2 weeks. I'm using my pre-configured dns with my desktop, mobiles.

I also tried disabling and removing all blocklists and user rules, but nothing works. It seems some certification issue.

I noticed this issue while reading news on DainikBhaskar app which opens some page for some of the news. But few weeks ago, it started giving error.

2. Screenshots: This always shows this error on all devices:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8d9608df-f699-4c25-9872-600fa6587fcd)]

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
